particlerain.title: Particle Rain Config
particlerain.description: Lowering these will reduce the amount of particles on screen, making the game run faster at the cost of more sparse looking effects
particlerain.maxParticleAmount.descripti: New weather particles will not be spawned if there are this many already in the world.
particlerain.particleDensity.description: Controls how many new particles will spawn per tick.
particlerain.particleStormDensity.descri: Controls how many new particles will spawn per tick during storms.
particlerain.particleDistance.descriptio: How many blocks away particles will appear.
particlerain.surfaceRange.description: How many blocks away particles spawned at the world's surface will appear.
particlerain.doMaterialSounds.descriptio: Makes the rain splashing noise match the material of the block it's falling onto.
particlerain.gustFrequency.description: Lower frequency increases the length of each wind gust.
particlerain.modulationSpeed.description: How fast the wind shifts over time.
particlerain.yLevelAdjustment.descriptio: Makes wind stronger higher up, and disabled below ground level.
particlerain.waterTint: Tint water particles with biome colors
particlerain.waterTint.description: Applies color to rain, streaks, drops, and splashes.
particlerain.tintMix.description: How much tinted water particles reflect the sky color instead of the water color.
particlerain.shaderpackTint: Only use sky color when shaders are enabled
particlerain.syncRegistries.description: Disable this if Particle Rain is preventing players from connecting to your LAN server.
particlerain.crossBiomeBorder.descriptio: Allows particles to drift into climates with a different temperature.
particlerain.useHeightmapTemp.descriptio: Prevents snow falling where it should be raining in biomes where the weather can vary by height, such as the Windswept Hills.
particlerain.doSpawnHeightLimit.descript: Prevents weather particles from spawning above the cloud height.
particlerain.spawnHeightLimit.descriptio: The height at which particles are considered to be spawning above clouds. When set to a value of zero the mod will use the cloud height from the current world.
particlerain.id.description: The string used to identify the particle in the registry, commands, and translations.
particlerain.density.description: The frequency the particle will spawn at relative to the overall particle density.
particlerain.suggest: Enter a world to see suggestions
particlerain.rotationAmount.description: How much the particle will rotate per tick.
particlerain.opacity.description: How see-through the particles are from fully transparent (0) to fully opaque (100).
particlerain.constantScreenSize.descript: Scales the particle by distance so that it remains the same size on the screen.
particlerain.renderType.description:
Defines how translucency is handled. 
BLENDED type may render incorrectly with some mods and is incompatible with shaderpacks as of Minecraft 1.21.5.
particlerain.useResourcepackResolution.d: Uses the resolution of the campfire smoke particle.
